label.saq_KE: Aa namba e simu niyeu ning'amarie ropiani te e Mpesa? (Na nje tiu +254 000 000 000)
label.tuv_KE: A namba ani a diit ithaki yong taanyuneia SMS a M-PESA? (Ichamit ikoni ne +254 000 000 000)
label.en: Which phone number do you want to receive your M-Pesa SMS on? (With country-code. It should look like: +254 000 000 000)
